action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: Stockholm
TO: Madrid
BY: Plane
CLASS: The most comfortable
WHEN: On April 10

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the travel agent already know your origin? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: No.

ANSWER: No, the travel agent does not know my origin yet.

TRAVEL-AGENT: Hi there! I'm your travel agent. Can you please tell me where you would like to travel from?

ANSWER: I would like to travel from Stockholm.
no
Answer for FROM valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Does the travel agent already know your destination? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: No. I have not told the travel agent my destination yet.

TRAVEL-AGENT: Hi there! How can I assist you with your travel plans?

ANSWER: Hi, I would like to book a flight from Stockholm to Madrid on April 10. I would like the most comfortable class available.
no
Answer for TO valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.

ANSWER: I would like to travel in the most comfortable class available.
no

ASIDE: No, I haven't mentioned the dates of my trip to the travel agent yet.

ANSWER: Hi, I would like to book a flight from Stockholm to Madrid.

ME: Do you prefer non-stop flights?

ASIDE: Yes, I prefer non-stop flights if possible. They are more convenient and save time. But if there are no non-stop flights available, I'm willing to consider flights with layovers as well.
